name: BouncyLasers
description:
Just because you can enjoy playing Bouncy Lasers while jumping on a trampoline doesn't mean you'll solve a level. This game requires increasing brain power as the levels progress.Use mirror orbs to bounce up to 6 different colored lasers through as many levels as you can handle. Red & Blue lasers bounce at 45 degrees, Green & Yellow at 90 degrees. Good luck even getting to the Magenta or White lasers. Figure out how to bounce them all simultaneously!

How to play:
Stuck on level 26? https://youtu.be/ynLDEGZta6o
